main event: A radar operator observed a stationary metallic object near Reims, France, which appeared on the radar for about 20 seconds before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was sharply defined and metallic in appearance., The sighting lasted for 20 seconds., The operator was monitoring ground radar at the time of the observation., There were concurrent visual sightings by several French Air Force officers., The object vanished suddenly after being stationary.
